name: Andrzej Ito
profile_summary: As a Senior Software Engineer, I bring over 9 years of experience in designing and building scalable software solutions. I have a strong track record of leading cross-functional teams, mentoring junior engineers, and delivering impactful projects that prioritize user experience, performance, and innovation. Currently, I’m focused on enhancing accessibility and driving technical excellence in everything I do.

experience.responsibilities:
Lead the development of key services within Java cloud-based applications, focusing on
Microservices Architecture and REST API design.  Designed and developed Hybrid-single Page Application using Java, Spring Boot, React 17 and
Redux 4.2.1.  Enhanced the React Observables with Redux, React-router and Redux-thunk.  Developed user interface by using React HOC, Flux/Redux for SPA development.  Worked on UI layer using Angular 14, HTML5, CSS, and Bootstrap to build rich, flexible and user
interactive web pages.  Hands on experience with Core Java with Multithreading, Concurrency, File Handling I/O, Generics, Data Structures and Collections, Garbage Collection.  Used Node.js, MongoDB and node package manager for installing dependencies and to run the
application in a web server in staging environment.  Experienced with RDBMS implementation and development using Oracle, MySQL, MS SQL and
PostgreSQL.  Automated Docker image deployment to a dev/fqt and production environment using Jenkins
and Ansible.

Involved in developing UI using Spring MVC framework, JSP, JSTL, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX and AngularJS.  Designed and implemented Model View Controller (MVC) architecture using Spring framework
and wrote Hibernate classes, DAO’s to retrieve & store data, configured Hibernate files.  Used Spring Core annotations for Spring Dependency Injection, Spring MVC for REST APIs and
Spring Boot for Microservices.  Developed a web application using React 12 as front-end and using Web API to receive and
pass data to back-end.  Created Reusable Modules and Custom Directives in Angular 12, 13 which got used in various
places of application.  Implemented Web Sockets for to enable real-time bidirectional communication.  Developed and integrated dashboard using ChartJS, and implemented authentication and using
Auth Guards.  Designed dynamic and multi-browser compatible web pages using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and jQuery, Angular JS, Ext Js, React JS, AJAX, Grunt and JSON.

Developed web applications using Spring MVC, jQuery, HTML, JavaScript, CSS, Web Forms, Material UI, Tailwind CSS and AJAX controls.  Used jQuery to implement user interface controls to validate client side validation.  Converted Photshop and Figma designs to table-less semantic XHTML, CSS.  Implemented CORS using Node.js and developed REST services using Node and Express.  Involved in designing SSIS packages to export data of flat file source to MS SQL Server.  Gained experience with various web technologies including Bower, NPM, Git, Material design, and cloud services like AWS, Azure, GCP, and Heroku.

skills: Java, C++, C#, Python, SQL, PLSQL  Spring, Spring Boot, Hibernate, Struts, JPA, Kotlin, Node.js, React, Vue, Angular , SOLID, DRY, LINQ, MS SQL Server, Oracle, MongoDB, Rabbit MQ, PostgreSQL, Redis, SOAP, REST APIs, Microservices
